overview: Hey Our People - A musical drama series about four youth reunions in Kuala Lumpur, each seeking their own destiny. All four of them lived in the same low-cost flats, so they touched each other's lives - just like the townspeople lived. Although each character has its own storyline, they share the same characteristics - young, poor, na√Øve and moved to the urge to survive.
title: Hey Orang Kita
